description: "This map of Asia, from an atlas by the German cartographer Karl von Spruner, is colour-coded to show territorial regions in Asia in the 11th and 12th centuries. Borneo is labelled ‘Kalemantan’, and Malaya is labelled ‘Tanah Malayu (Malai)’."
title: "Asien   im   XIten   und   XIIten   Jahrhunderts   ...   (Asia   in   the   XIth   and   XIIth   centuries)"
